response.message: I really like the way different designs are being played with, while keeping true to the SO way. I'm glad you hired some someone to create unique designs for each of the Stack Exchange sites instead of just tweaking some of the CSS a little.
Robert just a thought on the blog theme here. With lots of people posting now it would be really neat if the author could be up at the top. No biggie though.

I think that #1 and #7 will be that absolute essential questions that determine the life or death of any of these communities.

Keep us informed of whatever publicity efforts you detect within these communities.  The Gaming crowd might not follow the Food and Cooking meta site (and vice versa) but both might gain from hearing of the other's successful promotions, even though they are unlikely to be directly reproducible.
